data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S5, newest stock firmware, Android 6.0.1
data.actual_result: only @mentions show in the notification bar (on all servers I tested, it said that it updated and it did but still no notifications).
data.short_description: I can't get any notifications on some servers
data.steps_to_repro: - mute a server and deactivate all notifications - umute it and set it to "all messages" -
